metadata.title: Azure AI Developer Associate
metadata.subtitle: Become the AI Developer the World is Desperately Seeking
metadata.description: Imagine creating applications that can see, understand, and converse like humans. That's the power you'll wield as an Azure AI Developer. This isn't just about learning APIs - it's about becoming the architect of the intelligent systems that will define the future of technology and business.
prerequisites: A passion for building amazing user experiences
Basic programming skills in any language
Curiosity about how AI can solve real-world problems

highlights: Build AI applications that understand human language and intent
Create computer vision systems that see and interpret the world
Develop conversational AI that feels natural and intelligent
Master the AI tools that are revolutionizing every industry

overview.summary: Think about the most innovative companies in the world - they're all powered by AI. And they're all looking for developers who can harness that power. This course isn't about theoretical AI concepts - it's about giving you the practical skills to build the intelligent applications that businesses are begging for. You'll learn to create systems that can understand images, process natural language, generate human-like responses, and make smart decisions. By the end, you'll be the developer who can turn 'impossible' AI ideas into reality.
objectives: Master Azure AI services to build production-ready intelligent applications
Create computer vision solutions that extract insights from visual content
Build natural language processing systems that understand human communication
Develop conversational AI that provides seamless user experiences
Implement search solutions that understand context and intent
Deploy generative AI applications using Azure OpenAI Service
overview.targetAudience: This course is for developers who want to be at the forefront of the AI revolution. Whether you're a backend developer looking to add AI capabilities to your applications, a frontend developer wanting to create intelligent user interfaces, or someone who dreams of building the next big AI-powered product - if you want to be the developer who creates the intelligent systems that will define our future, this course will equip you with the skills and confidence to make it happen.

faq.question: Do I need machine learning experience?
faq.answer: No, this course covers both pre-built AI services and custom model development. Basic programming knowledge is sufficient.

faq.question: What programming languages are used?
faq.answer: The course uses Python, C#, and REST APIs. You'll work with Azure SDKs and the Azure portal.

faq.question: Can I use Azure OpenAI Service?
faq.answer: Yes, the course includes Azure OpenAI Service implementation for generative AI scenarios.

faq.question: Are there hands-on labs?
faq.answer: Yes, extensive hands-on labs where you'll build AI-powered applications using real Azure services.
